name: gemini_directory_gitignore
description: The .gemini/ directory should be included in the .gitignore file to prevent user-specific configuration from being committed to the repository.
rule: Ensure that the .gemini/ directory is listed in the top-level .gitignore file.
path_to_scripting: This rule can be implemented as a script that runs during repository initialization or as a periodic check. The script would read the `.gitignore` file at the root of the repository and check if `.gemini/` is present. If not, the script would append `.gemini/` to the `.gitignore` file, ensuring that the agent's sensitive configuration and temporary files are not accidentally committed to the repository.
